title: David Pastrnak’s goal-saving effort made impression on Bruins teammates
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "He's our leader.
He does everything.
He wants to win.

title: Jaylen Brown proclaims ‘we got enough’ on 2025-26 Celtics roster
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics "We’re looking at other teams — we feel like we’re just as talented or we could beat them.
" Jaylen Brown is expected to be Boston's de-facto scoring option this season.
AP Photo/Michael Dwyer The 2025-26 Celtics still have a solid core in place headlined the presence of established players like Jaylen Brown, Derrick White, and Payton Pritchard.

title: Could Patriots target Chris Olave in a trade? NFL insider gives his take
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "That's one where you could look at and say, 'That's a potential building block.
'" Chris Olave is on pace for 111 catches this season.
Kenneth Richmond/Getty Images The Patriots’ passing offense is already thriving in 2025 behind Drake Maye and a wideout corps featuring Stefon Diggs, Kayshon Boutte, and others.

title: Patriots QB Drake Maye brushes aside MVP talk after latest win
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "I think that’s a long way away.
Getting some more wins is what I’m focused on.
" Drake Maye has recorded 10 touchdowns and just two interceptions so far this season.

title: Bill Belichick dismisses reports of buyout talk with UNC as ‘categorically false’
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "Glad I’m here.
We’re working towards our goals and the process.
" Bill Belichick and the Tar Heels will take on Cal on Friday.

title: Titans fire Mike Vrabel’s replacement ahead of Patriots game
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots Brian Callahan went 4-19 during his time with the Titans.
Brian Callahan is out as Tennessee's head coach.
AP Photo/Rick Scuteri The Titans are once again in the market for a head coach.

title: ‘Just watch the effort’: Former Patriots RB highlights Rhamondre Stevenson’s hustle amid tough stretch
author: Trevor Hass
bullets: New England Patriots "When Mike Vrabel said they need Rhamondre, it’s because of stuff like this.
" Patriots running back Rhamondre Stevenson attempts to catch a pass Sunday afternoon.

Gerald Herbert/AP Photo By Trevor Hass October 13, 2025 | 1:32 PM 2 minutes to read It’s been a rocky start to the season for Rhamondre Stevenson, as the Patriots running back has more fumbles than touchdowns and has only eclipsed 40 rushing yards once in six games.

title: ‘It becomes comical’: Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel criticizes officiating
author: Trevor Hass
bullets: New England Patriots "I'm like, 'Did they even watch the video?
'" Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel throws the ball prior to a game against the New Orleans Saints on Sunday.

Maria Lysaker/AP Photo By Trevor Hass October 13, 2025 | 10:18 AM 2 minutes to read Patriots fans weren’t alone in expressing their dissatisfaction with the officiating during Sunday’s 25-19 win over the New Orleans Saints.

title: Anfernee Simons impresses offensively as Celtics roll over short-handed Cavaliers: 8 takeaways
author: Tom Westerholm
bullets: Boston Celtics Simons was locked in on Sunday – 6-for-9 from behind the arc with a team-high 21 points in 25 minutes.
Anfernee Simons scored 21 points Sunday against the Cavaliers.
